title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 501.5 - Maintenance of service line beyond highway limits
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 501.5 - Maintenance of service line beyond highway limits

State Regulations

That portion of the service pipe without the limits of a
street, avenue, road or way as hereinbefore defined or easement area shall be
provided, placed, constructed and maintained by the property owner or the
customer but in accordance with such reasonable specification for the
construction and maintenance thereof as may be filed in the tariff schedules of
said water-works corporation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
501.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
